name: Board Battle
description:
Board Battle

Board Battle is a game with multiple game modes taken place on a board. 

How to play Local Mode:

  • Make sure you have 2 people
  • Click any tile to select it.
  • Place objects by selecting a card in the bottom of the screen. (Make sure to have enough resources)
  • The goal is to eliminate the other team.

How to play Puzzle Mode:

  • W-A-S-D or Arrow Keys to move.
  • Space button to wait
  • Z to undo
  • R to restart
